thread.title: Get pinup vintage 1950s hair with rockabilly rolls

title: Get pinup vintage 1950s hair with rockabilly rolls
text:
Updated: Aug 13, 2015 13:11 IST Rockabilly rolls are extremely versatile but difficult to carry off. (Pinterest Photo) 
Rockabilly rolls are extremely versatile. The rockabilly hairstyle became famous in the early 1940s and 1950s. The hairstyle was inspired by rock nâ€™ roll country music. Victory rolls are one variant of the style with parted hair fashioned with two rolls on either side. 
Style it right Rockabilly rolls are extremely versatile but difficult to carry off. Since they are pretty dramatic, make sure you only sport them according to the occasion. For a stand-out look, go for a swirled, banana-roll style hairdo (like that on Gwen Stefani) and finish with a graphic tee and ripped denims.
